short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Save, view, and manage Airtable and Fillout form links in one place with a clean, intuitive popup interface.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Vik’s Popup Forms is a productivity-boosting Chrome extension designed to help you quickly open and access Airtable and Fillout forms without navigating away from your current webpage. Whether you're adding tasks, logging contacts, or managing job entries, this tool keeps essential forms just a click away, making data entry seamless and efficient.

What It Does:

Instant Form Access: Open forms from Airtable and Fillout directly in a popup, allowing you to fill them out without interrupting your current workflow or losing the page you're on.
Add New Entries Effortlessly: Perfect for quick data entry on the go—add tasks, jobs, contacts, and more in real-time.
Clear, Intuitive Interface: Organizes your form links in an easy-to-navigate layout, so you can find and open the forms you need without delays.
Seamless Multitasking: Access forms on demand, even if you’re in the middle of another task. This means you can record information instantly without leaving the webpage in front of you.
Expandable Options: Currently supports Airtable and Fillout forms, with more form platforms coming soon to enhance versatility.
Why You Should Install It:
If you work with forms daily and need quick, efficient access to manage tasks, contacts, or data entries, Vik’s Popup Forms is built for you. It eliminates the hassle of switching between tabs or windows, allowing you to stay focused on your main task while updating forms in the background.

Use Cases:

Task Managers: Instantly open and fill out task forms while reviewing other documents or web resources.
Recruiters and HR: Quickly log job applicants, interview notes, or contact details without disrupting your workflow.
Project Coordinators: Easily update project forms, add new entries, or manage data inputs while keeping other essential project info in view.
Sales and CRM: Access contact and lead forms quickly, ensuring no details are missed while working on customer-related tasks.
With Vik's Popup Forms, streamline your workflow, reduce interruptions, and stay on top of your tasks. Perfect for professionals who need reliable, quick access to forms in their daily operations!
